flawed_nl_solution:
Malcom has 20 cards + 8 cards = <<20+8=28>>28 cards.
Malcom gives away 1/2 * 28 cards = <<1/2*28=41>>41 cards to Mark.
Malcom has 28-41 cards = <<28-41=-13>>-13 cards remaining.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 14, not 41. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
